ðŸ“… Recruitment Timeline

Recruitment usually happens during the first few weeks of each semester.
Applications for leadership positions are released at the end of each semester, with recruitment occurring over the break.
Project Managers: Recruited during the first week of each semester. Project Members: Recruited early in the fall semester, with applications announced via Instagram and LinkedIn.
Project managers gain leadership experience, people management skills, and hands-on experience with agile methodology and product management.
Either software engineering (SWE) or AI projects, preferably with a social impact focus.
Good Project Members: Eager to learn, self-motivated, and team-oriented Good Project Managers: Technically competent with strong team management skills.
Self-initiative, eagerness to learn, and a collaborative mindset are crucial for success in P-ai.
